Body:
n = 100
rng = np.random.RandomState(0)
x = rng.randn(n, 2)
u = ot.utils.unif(n)
M = ot.dist(x, x)
G = ot.emd(u, u, M)
np.testing.assert_allclose(G, np.eye(n) / n)
np.testing.assert_allclose(u, G.sum(1))
np.testing.assert_allclose(u, G.sum(0))
w = ot.emd2(u, u, M)
np.testing.assert_allclose(w, 0)
